text: I used this road to get from the bus stop Oppo Neptune Ct to East Coast. It's a really nice road. Google Maps didn't show it as a cycling route, but it's definitely usable for bikes. I hope this information helps improve Google Maps.

Easy walk between the main Marine Parade Road and the underpass that leads to East Coast Park.

Front of the park connector is a taxi stand, in between the two condominiums Neptune Court and Mandarin Gardens.

Underpass goes under the ECP highway, and has both a ramp for easy cycling and disabled access and stairs on both ends.
Poorly maintained. But does provide great accessibility to the East Coast park.
This is not (yet) officially a park connector
